entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
